name: Hudson Technologies, Inc.
description: Hudson Technologies, Inc. is a leading provider of innovative solutions for the refrigeration and air conditioning industries. Founded in 1991 and headquartered in Pearl River, New York, Hudson Technologies specializes in the reclamation and recycling of refrigerants, offering environmentally responsible alternatives to traditional refrigerants. The company plays a crucial role in the transition to more sustainable practices in HVAC and refrigeration, ensuring compliance with environmental regulations while helping businesses reduce their carbon footprint. Hudson Technologies is also known for its proprietary technologies and services, which enhance the efficiency and performance of HVAC systems. Through its comprehensive product offerings, including refrigerant management services, system retrofitting, and energy-efficient solutions, Hudson aims to provide customers with significant cost savings and improved sustainability. With a strong commitment to innovation and environmental stewardship, Hudson Technologies continues to lead the charge in creating a greener future in the refrigeration industry.
